data.title: Sanjeev has been awarded the Sahitya Akademi Award for Hindi language.
data.meta_description:
Recently the Sahitya Akademi Awards for the year 2023 were announced.
Sahitya Akademi Award is given for writing in 24 languages.
Sanjeev of Hindi language has been honored with the Sahitya Akademi
data.canonical_link: https://sarkaripariksha.com/current-affairs/Sanjeev has been awarded the Sahitya Akademi Award for Hindi language./
